text: Hagi Menahemu'a Tirsa rankumateti agafa huteno vuno Tipsa rankumate vahera hara ome hunezmanteno, ana kumamofo tavaoma'arema megagi'nea ne'onse kumapi vahera zamahe vaganereno, zamu'enema hu'naza a'nenea zamazerino kazinu zamarimpa reraragufe'ne. E'inama hu'neana i'oma hazageno kumazmifima uofre'nea zante anara hu'ne.
